title: Can send tokens in Aragon Dapp in Finance section
body: ***Type***: Bug ***Summary***: Second `Send transaction` screen does not appear when sending tokens withing Aragon Dapp from it's Finance section (Demo project is used). It's all fine when sending ETH though. #### Expected behavior Second transaction appears when sending tokens withing Aragon Dapp from Finance section (Demo project is used) #### Actual behavior Second transaction does not appear when sending tokens withing Aragon Dapp in Finance section (Demo project is used). `Waiting for Signature...` screen stays. ### Reproduction - Open Status and recover an account with positive ETH and SNT balance on Mainnet - Navigate to `+` -> `Open Dapp` -> `Aragon` -> `Open` - At the Dapp screen bottom tap 'Demo organisation' - Tap top-left menu button -> `Finance` - Tap top-right Aragon wallet button to get to `New Transfer` screen - In `TOKEN` list select SNT and enter valid amount <= your SNT balance - Tap 'Create transaction' button - Sign first transaction from 'Send transaction' screen. Tap 'Done' on confirmation screen. **Actual result:** Aragon's screen with the `Waiting for Signature...` message displays. No second 'Send transaction' screen appears. **Expected result:** Second 'Send transaction' screen appears. - Try to send any other (or again SNT) token from 'New transfer' screen (Top-right wallet button -> Submit deposit -> Create transaction) **Actual result:** `Waiting for Signature...` screen appears and not Status wallet 'Send transaction' screen appears. ### Additional Information * Status version: Release 0.9.32, Develop 0.9.33 (2019012902) nightly * Operating System: Android and iOS [logcat.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/2807697/logs.log) starting from navigating to Aragon Dapp
